law.catch_line: In addition to any remedies otherwise available at law, a violation of this subtitle shall be:...
law.text:
In addition to any remedies otherwise available at law, a violation of this subtitle shall be:
An unfair or deceptive trade practice under Title 13, Subtitle 3 of this article; and
If the violation involves a solicitation offering credit services, a violation of the Maryland Credit Services Businesses Act.
